amendment.description: An amendment numbered 25 printed in Part B of House Report 116-32 to ensure the inclusion of guidelines and best practices for the creation of employee assistance programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Krishnamoorthi amendment (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A025) offered by Mr. Krishnamoorthi.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Krishnamoorthi amendment (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.
